statements: DELETE FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 200 AND rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 AND sentiment_category = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM product_ratings WHERE product_id = 123 AND total_ratings < 50;
DELETE FROM customer_sentiments WHERE sentiment_id = 456 OR sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM customers_reviews WHERE id = 100 AND customer_id = 25;
DELETE FROM feedback_analysis WHERE product_id = 500 AND sentiment_label = 'positive';
